TEST_NAME: Classic Columns links must have aria and title
QUERY_CLOB:
with aaprc as (select case
                     when ((lower(trim(column_link_attributes)) not like '%aria-%'
                            and lower(trim(column_link_attributes)) not like '%title%')
                            or trim(column_link_attributes) is null ) then 'N' 
                     else 'Y'
                   end pass_yn,
                  page_id,
                  application_id,
                  region_name,
                  column_alias, 
                  column_link_attributes,
                  last_updated_by,
                  last_updated_on,
                  build_option,
                  column_is_hidden,
                  heading,
                  region_report_column_id,
							    workspace
             from apex_application_page_rpt_cols
             where column_link_url is not null
             and column_is_hidden = 'No')
select aaprc.pass_yn,                          
       aaprc.application_id, 
       aaprc.page_id,
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       aaprc.last_updated_by,
       aaprc.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Classic Report Column `%0` (app %1, page %2) link is missing title & aria', 
        p0 => aaprc.heading, 
        p1 => aaprc.application_id,
        p2 => aaprc.page_id) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Classic Report Column `%0` link is missing title & aria (app %1, page %2, colum id %3)', 
        p0 => aaprc.heading, 
        p1 => aaprc.application_id,
        p2 => aaprc.page_id,
				p3 => aaprc.region_report_column_id) issue_title,
       aaprc.region_report_column_id component_id,
       null parent_component_id,
       aaprc.heading,
       aaprc.column_is_hidden,
       aaprc.column_alias,
			 aaprc.workspace
from aaprc
inner join apex_application_pages aap on aap.page_id = aaprc.page_id and aap.application_id = aaprc.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo1 on aabo1.build_option_name = aap.build_option
                                                     and aabo1.application_id = aap.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo2 on aabo2.build_option_name = aaprc.build_option
                                                     and aabo2.application_id = aaprc.application_id
where aaprc.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
and coalesce(aabo1.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and coalesce(aabo2.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
EXPLANATION:
This test is tied to the following WCAG Codes :

1.  2.4.4(A) : Link Purpose (In Context) :  
    The purpose of each link can be determined from the link text alone or from the link text together with its programmatically determined link context, except where the purpose of the link would be ambiguous to users in general.
FIX: Add something like `title = "Edit  #USER_NAME#" aria-label = "Edit  #USER_NAME#"` to the Link Attributes field
